name: Skullcrown

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally SPD in the Arena by 23%.

skills.name: Wave of Souls
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Places an extra hit if the target has more than 50% HP.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Corrupting Touch
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Resilient
skills.raw_description:
Places an [Unkillable] buff on this Champion for 1 turn every time their HP drops below 20%.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1

skills.name: From Beyond
skills.raw_description:
Revives this Champion with 30% HP.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
